head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HUBBARD, JEFFREY JOHN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HUBBARD, JEFFREY JOHN

block.p: HUBBARD-Jeffrey John. On July 3, of NYC and Brookville, NY. Beloved husband of Marie Corbett Hubbard. Son of John A. Hubbard and the late Jeannette R. Hubbard, and brother of Sarah M. Conk. In repose at the Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd, Manhasset, Friday 3-5 and 79 PM. Interment Saturday, 10:30 AM, Nassau Knolls Cemetery.
